title: customerPortalSettings
description: These settings apply to your users accessing the CDN360 portal.

enforce2fa.description: Set to true to use two factor authentication to improve security.

passwordExpirationDays.description: Indicates how many days a portal user's password can remain the same before it must be updated. The user will be emailed a warning in advance of the expiration.

logoutIdleTime.description: Number of seconds the portal user can be idle before being automatically logged out.

ipWhiteList.description: List of IP addresses from which portal users can log in. You can specify a range, an individual IP address, or an IP in CIDR notation. Example: ["1.1.1.1-1.1.1.8", "1.2.3.4", "1.5.5.0/24"] The default is ["0.0.0.0/0"] which permits API calls from all IP addresses. For security, we strongly recommend specifying appropriate IP addresses in your company. Child customers of a reseller can modify this setting to meet their requirements.
